name: Shield, wing and turret
description:
[Unfinished - on develepoment]

Fly through a bullet-filled sky, dodge, shoot, and use your shield to survive in this small but "beautiful" bullet hell. 

This game  is created in the context of the weekly game jam 154, with the theme of "rock paper scissors"

We are a little team, part of a university student  initative called USMgames

#WeeklyGameJam #WGJGame

https://itch.io/jam/weekly-game-jam-154

Install instructions

Download, extract, and run.
